==Useful Info==
'''Tengu warriors''' are aggressive [[list of tengu|tengu]] combatants, with multiple melee attacks. They can slip behind the player when attacking, and come with decent armour and weapons. They can be found in the late [[Dungeon]] and early [[Depths]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*Tengu warriors are not especially strong if you've cleared out [[the Lair]]. Their max damage is a bit over an [[orc warlord]]s', but spread over multiple attacks, and tengu don't have the same durability. An [[out-of-depth]] tengu, however, can be dangerous, due to their fast movement speed.
*Tengu warriors often generate with [[ego]] [[buckler]]s or [[kite shield]]s.
*Be careful if you are quickly pressing movement keys to attack, as these tengus can change position while attacking you.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], tengu warriors had fast movement but would not flank behind the player when attacking.
*Tengu warriors were often accompanied with a band of [[raven]]s prior to their removal in [[0.17]].
*Tengu warriors were added in [[0.13]], but were disabled due to the eventual scrapping of the [[Forest]]. They were reintroduced in [[0.14]], showing up with bands of [[tengu]] in the Depths, and started appearing with bands of ravens in [[0.15]].
